featured.text: This north-south preference has also been noted in flies, termites and honeybees.

definition.zh_def: 白蟻，一種以木材和植物為食的社會性昆蟲，通常在群體中生活。
definition.en_def: A termite is a social insect that feeds on wood and plant material, typically living in colonies.
definition.example: The termite infestation damaged the wooden beams in the house.
